name: Iron Dome Simulator
description:
Defend civilians against terrorist rockets! Modern Missile Command

Iron Dome Simulator puts you in charge of the short range rocket defense system of the IDF. Defend against waves of rockets targeting civilians.

Instructions:

When you tap the Iron Dome button you make a new Iron Dome you can drag into position. The goal is to best position your Iron Domes to stop and intercept missiles and save lives.
